Game Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the game directory.

INI Path.tooltip: Specifies the path to the INI files.

Restore Backup.tooltip: Select the backup you wish to restore.

Note:.Description: These changes require a restart to take effect.

Max Backups to Keep.tooltip: Select the maximum number of backups to be kept.

Max Logs to Keep.tooltip: Select the maximum number of log files to be kept.

Always Select Game.tooltip: Toggles whether or not you must always select the game at startup.

Antialiasing.tooltip: Specifies the antialiasing (AA) applied to edges to make them smoother and less jagged.

Default World FOV.tooltip: Sets the default world field of view.

Default FOV.tooltip: Sets the default field of view.

Default 1st Person FOV.tooltip: Sets the default 1st person field of view.

Always Active.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the game to remain active when it is out of focus (i.e. if in a windowed mode setup, if one clicks outside the game window with this enabled, the game will not pause).

64-Bit Render Targets.tooltip: Toggles 64-bit render targets. Disabling this can cause a significant performance boost with very little visual difference. Basically it is a more precise method of rendering that reduces banding artifacts.

VSync.tooltip: Toggles vertical synchronization (VSync), which removes screen tearing.

Lock Frame Rate.tooltip: Toggles the ability for the game to lock the frame rate to 60 frames per second.

Havok FPS.tooltip: Sets the maximum framerate supported by game physics.

Reset to Default.tooltip:
Resets your INI files to their default values.

Note that not all settings will be set to their default values, as you probably don't want us to touch your screen resolution and mouse look sensitivity... that sorta thing ;)

Apply Recommended Tweaks.tooltip: This sets certain recommended tweaks for all users.

Bethini Presets.tooltip:
Changes the preset buttons to use Bethini Presets.

Hint: These presets are better ;)

Vanilla Presets.tooltip: Changes the preset buttons to use the vanilla presets.

Brightness Boost.tooltip: Sets the global brightness boost modifier

Contrast Boost.tooltip: Sets the global contrast boost modifier

Saturation Boost.tooltip: Sets the global saturation boost modifier

Bloom Boost.tooltip: Sets the global bloom threshold boost modifier

Subtitle Language.tooltip: Sets the language used for subtitles.

Freebies Seen.tooltip: Toggles the pop-up to download the Creation Club Content.

Show Markers.tooltip: Toggles markers useful for modders. Do NOT use for actual gameplay'

Max Cached Sound Size.tooltip: Sets the maximum size for cached sound.

Max Autosaves.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of autosaves to keep.

Save on Pause.tooltip: Toggles autosaves made upon closing certain menus that pause the game.

Save on Pause Timer.tooltip: Sets the timer to make a new autosave upon closing certain menus that pause the game.

Save on Travel.tooltip: Toggles autosaves made after traveling to different locations.

Missing Content Warning.tooltip: Toggles the missing content warning when loading a saved game missing a previously enabled plugin.

Compression.tooltip: Sets the type of compression used on the save game file.

Post-Load Update Time.tooltip: Sets time, in milliseconds, given to scripts to update after loading.

Max Allocated Memory.tooltip: Sets the maximum memory that Papyrus can hold at a time.

Logging.tooltip: Toggles Papyrus logs being written to disk.

Debug Info.tooltip: Toggles additional debug information. If enabled, line number information will be available in error traces at the expense of higher memory usage.

Profiling.tooltip: Toggles script profiling, which enables profiling commands and allows profiling information to be logged, at the cost of some script performance.

Screenshots Directory.tooltip: Sets the location of game screenshots.

Filename.tooltip: Sets the base filename of game screenshots.

Always Drive Ragdoll.tooltip: Toggles always drive ragdoll. This makes ragdolls more animated when bumped.

Always Run by Default.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the character to always run by default. If turned off, you can still run, but walking is the default action.

Combat Dialogue.tooltip: Toggles those cheeky comments that enemies say while in combat.

Hit Recoil.tooltip: Toggles hit recoil. Actors respond to being punched.

NPCs Use Ammo.tooltip: Toggles off unlimited NPC ammo. If enabled, NPCs will no longer have access to unlimited ammo, but shall be forced to only use the ammo they possess.

Remove Borders.tooltip: Toggles off the borders at the edges of the map.

1st Person Arrow Tilt-up Angle.tooltip: Sets the upward tilt angle of arrows in 1st-person view.

3rd Person Arrow Tilt-up Angle.tooltip: Sets the upward tilt angle of arrows in 3rd-person view.

1st Person Bolt Tilt-up Angle.tooltip: Sets the upward tilt angle of crossbow bolts in 1st-person view.

Max Arrow Range.tooltip: Sets the maximum distance that arrows can hit actors.

Weapon Change Clear Time.tooltip: Sets the weapon change clear time.

Over-Encumbered Reminder.tooltip: Sets the time interval between subsequent "You are carrying too much to be able to run" messages in seconds.

Book Open Time.tooltip: Sets the time in milliseconds it takes to open books. 50 appears to be the minimum amount for you to still be able to read the book, but might vary.

Horse Dismount Delay.tooltip: Sets the time in milliseconds it takes for the camera to readjust after dismounting a horse.

Subtitle Speaker Name Color.tooltip: Sets the subtitle text color of the name of the person speaking.

Dialogue Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are directly talking to you.

General Subtitles.tooltip: Toggles subtitles for NPCs who are not directly talking to you.

Bethesda Modding Platform.tooltip: Toggles Bethesda's built-in modding platform. If disabled, Creation Club news will no longer appear, but the "Mods" and "Creation Club" buttons will still be active, albeit probably broken.

Mod Manager Menu.tooltip: Toggles the "Mods" menu item in the in-game system menu.

Max Custom Name Length.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of characters that can be used for custom names of items renamed during enchanting.

Quest Markers.tooltip: Toggles quest markers on the map and the compass.

Floating Quest Markers.tooltip: Toggles floating quest markers on items and characters.

Screen Percentage.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the screen that the in-game console can fill.

Text Size.tooltip: Sets the size for text in the in-game console.

Text Input Color.tooltip: Sets the color of text typed into the console.

Text Output Color.tooltip: Sets the color of the text output in the console.

Unlock Map Menu Navigation.tooltip: Unlocks the map menu navigation so that when the right mouse button is held, the camera can move more freely.

Remove Map Blur.tooltip: Unlocks the map menu navigation so that when the right mouse button is held, the camera can move more freely.

Map Brightness Boost.tooltip: Sets the global brightness boost modifier for the map.

Map Contrast Boost.tooltip: Sets the global contrast boost modifier for the map.

Map Bloom Boost.tooltip: Sets the global bloom threshold boost modifier for the map.

Invert Y.tooltip: Toggles the ability of the the mouse to be inverted over the y-axis (up and down movement).

Look Sensitivity.tooltip: Sets the look sensitivity (how fast the camera moves in response to the mouse).

Cursor Velocity.tooltip: Sets the velocity of the mouse cursor in menus, such as the inventory menu.

X Scale.tooltip: Sets the mouse horizontal scale value (how much the camera moves when moving the mouse horizontally).

Y Scale.tooltip: Sets the mouse vertical scale value (how much the camera moves when moving the mouse vertically).

Mouse Wheel Zoom Speed.tooltip: Sets the transition speed when zooming in and out in third person mode using the mouse wheel. This also affects how fast the transition from first to third person occurs.

Projected UV Diffuse Normals.tooltip: Toggles the use of projected UV diffuse normals. It is recommended to leave this enabled. Some mods missing the appropriate projecteddiffuse.dds texture can cause this feature to looked bugged.

Improved Shader.tooltip: Toggles the improved snow shader. Please note that "improved" is subjective in this case. It is recommended to be disabled in most cases.

Snow Mask.tooltip: Toggles the snow mask. This adds an effect to certain landscapes around snow.

Sparkle Intensity.tooltip: Sets the intensity of snow sparkles.

Sparkle Density.tooltip: Sets the density of snow sparkles.

Sparkle Size.tooltip: Sets the size of snow sparkles.

Rim Lighting Intensity.tooltip: Sets the intensity of rim lighting.

Rim Lighting Geometry Power.tooltip: Sets the power of gloss/rim lighting on snow-covered geometry. Higher values are darker. Lower values are brighter.

Rim Lighting Landscape.tooltip: Sets the power of gloss/rim lighting on snow-covered landscape. Higher values are darker. Lower values are brighter.

Fade-in.tooltip: Toggles the gradual, fade-in effect for grass.

Grass Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where grass starts to fade.

Grass Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the grass fade range distance.

Minimum Wind.tooltip: Sets the minimum wind magnitude blowing grass.

Maximum Wind.tooltip: Sets the maximum wind magnitude blowing grass.

Dynamic Trees.tooltip: Toggles between dynamic and static tree model rendering.

Skinned Trees.tooltip: Toggles the rendering of enhanced tree detail.

Max Skinned Trees.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of trees to render with enhanced tree detail.

Skinned Trees Distance.tooltip: Sets the distance that trees have full skinned details. The trees switch to the lower quality SwitchNode mesh within the nif after this distance.

Level 1 Tree Details.tooltip: Sets the level 1 skinned tree detail fade distance.

Level 2 Tree Details.tooltip: Sets the level 2 skinned tree detail fade distance.

Reflect Trees.tooltip: Toggles tree reflections in the water.

Reflect Land.tooltip: Toggles land reflections in the water.

Reflect Objects.tooltip: Toggles object reflections in the water.

Reflect Sky.tooltip: Toggles the sky reflection in the water.

Water SSR Blur.tooltip: Sets the amount of blur on screen space reflections in water.

Water SSR Intensity.tooltip: Sets the intensity of screen space reflections in water.

Water SSR Perturbation.tooltip: Sets the perturbation scale of screen space reflections in water.

Tree Shadows.tooltip: Toggles the ability of trees to cast shadows upon themselves.

Land Shadows.tooltip: Toggles the ability of land objects such as rocks and mountains to cast shadows.

Shadow Bias.tooltip: Sets the directional bias of the shadows applied to surfaces. Low values reduce peter-panning (detached shadows), but cause more shadow acne (AKA shadow striping).

Shadow Filtering.tooltip: Sets the amount of shadow filtering.

Detailed Draw Distance.tooltip: Sets the detailed draw distance (the shadows closest to your character).

Focus Shadows.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of objects to use very highly detailed shadows based on where you are looking.

High Tree Shadow Limit.tooltip: Sets the maximum height that trees can cast high tree shadows.

SAO Value Diff Factor.tooltip: Sets the SAO value diff factor.

Disable Gore.tooltip: Toggles gory effects, such as blood.

Max Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of decals that can be shown per frame.

Max Skinned Decals.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals.

Max Skinned Decals Per Frame.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals that can be shown per frame.

Max Skinned Decals Per Actor.tooltip: Sets the maximum number of skinned decals per actor.

Decal Lifetime.tooltip: Sets the time in seconds that some decals will stay visible.

Decal Distance.tooltip: Sets the distance that some decals will show.

Particles.tooltip: Sets the amount of particle effects.

Interior Godrays.tooltip: Toggles Godrays in interiors. This may cause interiors to become overly bright in some cases.

Anamorphic Lens Flare.tooltip: Toggles the horizontal lens flare effect most commonly associated with anamorphic lenses.

Rain Occlusion.tooltip: Toggles precipitation occlusion (rain will not appear under roofs).

SSR Resolution Divider.tooltip: Sets the resolution divider of screen space reflections.

Depth of Field.tooltip: Toggles depth of field (DOF), a kind of blurring to imitate the human eye's perception, in imagespace. This is most noticeable under water, reducing visibility to realistic levels (it looks clear otherwise). It is recommended to leave this enabled, as most of the bad depth of field is controlled by the DOF Multiplier below.

DOF Multiplier.tooltip: Sets the depth of field multiplier.

Environment Map Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where the environment map starts to fade.

Environment Map Fade End.tooltip: Sets the environment map fade end distance.

Refraction Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where refraction starts to fade.

Refraction Fade End.tooltip: Sets the refraction fade end distance.

Specular Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where specularity starts to fade.

Specular Fade End.tooltip: Sets the specular fade end distance.

Decal Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where decals start to fade.

Decal Fade End.tooltip: Sets the decal fade end distance.

Light Fade Start.tooltip: Sets the distance where light starts to fade

Light Fade Range.tooltip: Sets the light fade range distance.

Level 1 Object Details.tooltip: Sets the level 1 object detail fade distance.

Level 2 Object Details.tooltip: Sets the level 2 object detail fade distance.

Flickering Light Distance.tooltip: Sets the flickering light fade distance

uGridsToLoad.tooltip: Sets how many grids will be actively rendered and processed around the Player Character (PC).

Level 4 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 4 block distance. This is the distance that level 4 object LOD is shown. Additionally, level 4 terrain LOD is shown at this distance, but multiplied by the Terrain Multiplier (fSplitDistanceMult).

Level 8 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 8 block distance. This is the distance that level 8 object LOD is shown. Additionally, level 8 terrain LOD is shown at this distance, but multiplied by the Terrain Multiplier (fSplitDistanceMult).

Level 16 Block Distance.tooltip: Sets the level 16 block distance. This is the distance that level 16 object LOD is shown. Additionally, level 16 terrain LOD is shown at this distance, but multiplied by the Terrain Multiplier (fSplitDistanceMult).

Terrain Multiplier.tooltip: Sets the terrain multiplier. This value gets multiplied by the block distances to determine the terrain LOD distance.

Tree LOD Distance.tooltip: Sets the tree LOD distance. Set to 0 if using DynDOLOD Ultra trees in object LOD.

Land Fade.tooltip: Toggles terrain LOD fade. Recommended to be disabled to prevent flickering.

Large Reference Grid.tooltip: Sets how many grids full models for large references will show past the uGridsToLoad cells without the need to set the IsFullLOD flag
